<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Safeguard Soul](/Feats.aspx?ID=3472) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 27</row>

**Archetype** [Soul Warden](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=173)

**Prerequisites**
[Soul Warden Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3466)

</column>

---

You've girded your soul against outside interference. You gain a +2 status bonus to saving throws against [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [possession](/Traits.aspx?ID=129) effects, and effects that attempt to manipulate or steal your soul. You can't be transformed into an [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) by any means. While your spiral is glowing, your allies in the light of the spiral gain this benefit as well.
name: Safeguard Soul
